(Xavier)
lenders.occupational_info: René (my husband) was a professor of Latin American Literature at the University of Minnesota.  He recently passed away and is remembered, in part, through his donations to Kiva.  Selena(16) and Xavier(14) are my children.  I consider my work to be specific to their upbringing in that we homeschool (more specifically unschool).

lenders.loan_because: I read an article in Libération (a french newspaper) describing Kiva and what it is about. I think it is a good idea to help poor people, all over the world, who cannot get loans because of high interests rates.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy telecommunications services for a multinational company

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I am a firm believer of "what comes around, goes around".  Many people have given a helping hand to me in my life - food, a drive to work, a helping hand, a dollar for lunch - and I must extend what I can to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: A factory worker at night, this is physically demanding and repetitious work; not a highly desirable job.  However, it is fairly steady pay with good benefits, close to my home, and supports me as I return to college, work the farm where my horse is, and help me start my own business (pet-sitting).

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I just think it's fair.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: God commands us to share what we have.  People have helped me along the way and I want to pay it forward.  These entrepreneurs inspire and amaze me - they have virtually nothing to work with but they manage to find the energy and drive within themselves to push forward and make life better for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for five Psychologists in a psychiatric unit of a hospital.  I do all their office work; type their reports; keep files in order; set up new support groups, etc.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.occupational_info: i help find audiences for our company's children's books and TV shows

lenders.name: isa & louise-mata

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: People who build their own businesses improve their communities exponentially.

lenders.name: Brandy
lenders.loan_because: I have an interest in entrepreneurship and delight in the opportunity to support individuals with an entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I audit financial statements of large public companies to ensure that information that investors rely on for decision making is accurate and fairly presented.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I believe all humanity is related, like a family, and responsible for helping each other.

lenders.name: Danièle M.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help a little and feel a connection with people in different parts of the world.

lenders.name: Star
lenders.loan_because: I want to give folks a chance to improve their lives.  This type of financing may not be available through financial institutions in their countries and perhaps all they need is a little money and encouragement .  I can help them get started or expand!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a federal agency that helps US exporters expand into new markets across the world.  We do this by offering services to find distributors and/or other partners for their products or services.

lenders.name: Judie
lenders.loan_because: I care about being part of a community.
lenders.occupational_info: Lots of studying about how to take care of people when they are in need of medical care.

lenders.name: God bless!
lenders.loan_because:
Freely you have received, freely give.
Matthew 10:8

One man gives freely, yet gains even more; another withholds unduly, but comes to poverty.
Proverbs 11:24
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an American Soldier. 
I am a Warrior and a member of a team. 
I serve the people of the United States, and live the Army Values. 
I will always place the mission first. 
I will never accept defeat. 
I will never quit. 
I will never leave a fallen comrade. 
I am disciplined, physically and mentally tough, 
Trained and proficient in my warrior tasks and drills. 
I always maintain my arms, my equipment and myself. 
I am an expert and I am a professional. 
I stand ready to deploy, engage, and destroy, the enemies of the United States of America in close combat. 
I am a guardian of freedom and the American way of life. 
I am an American Soldier.

lenders.name: Nermin & Friends
lenders.loan_because: Less for me - More for others - Enough for all

lenders.name: justin
lenders.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters in Christ

lenders.name: Kevin

lenders.name: Janice

lenders.occupational_info: I am a 15 year old ninth grade student in Shanghai.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people meet their potential and to help them bring their country to their full potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I use the arts to help children find positive means with which to express their feelings and to find joy and hope.  They also learn how to live in community and to develop basic leadership skills.  As a therapist ,my goal is also to help others to feel good about themselves and fulfill their purpose in this world.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help folks who work hard get a chance to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people of all ages how to create things out of clay and other materials.

lenders.occupation: Founder and Executive Director of PandoProjects
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the borrowers.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am now starting PandoProjects, an incubator for grassroots initiatives.

I served as a Kiva Fellow in Bosnia (Zene Za Zene), Kenya (Kisumu Medical Education Trust) and the Philippines (Community Economic Ventures.)

lenders.name: Allison & Mr. Pants
lenders.occupation: pottery and bead studio.  Gemstone shop.
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info:
During the day I work in a studio where anyone can come in and paint pottery.    The studio also does beading.  We sell beads and help people complete their jewelry.  Evenings and weekends, I teach photography at the Pennsylvania College of Art and Design.
I'm also the co-owner of a rock shop where people buy gemstones, minerals, crystals and fossils.

lenders.name: Dalia y Miguel
lenders.loan_because: We think a small loan can make a big difference in the life of many people

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: La vie m\'a beaucoup donné et il faut savoir renvoyer l\'ascenseur. En passant, merci à Kiva pour cette belle opportunité.\r\nLife\'s been good for me, I feel it\'s time for a payback  and , by the way, thank you Kiva for this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: Je pratique comme généraliste, mais j\'ai également développé une pratique en gynécologie et en obstétrique.\r\nI treat people for a variety of diseases, especially in the gyecology ans obstetrical  field

Matthew 9:37

lenders.loan_because: I believe that anybody that wants to start something like a business should have a chance to do that.

lenders.name: Page
lenders.loan_because: well, my dad was the one who really got me involved in this. He showed it to me one day and i thought it was really cool, so for Christmas, he gave me a $100 credit, and I've been loaning ever since. I care about human suffering, and this seems like a great way to start helping some of the people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently attending University of Granada, España to study Spanish history and culture.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper

lenders.name: Mansi
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Eden
lenders.loan_because: I can....I consider it my honor to help others have the same basic necessities in their lives that the rest of us usually have. I believe in the idea that people don\'t really want charity, they want to take care of themselves and their families and keep their dignity while doing so!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in physical rehabilitation; I help bring people back from injury or surgery so they can function in a normal or nearly normal fashion.

lenders.occupational_info: I sell to foreign publishers around the world the right to translate into their language the books we publish in French.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with businesses to create executive benefit programs.

lenders.name: Earth Spirits
lenders.loan_because: as a group of women supporting each other, all people and the Earth, we felt it necessary to share our blessings with people in need in other countries instead of exchanging gifts at this holiday season.
lenders.occupational_info: Earth Spirits Herbal Apothacary and Holistic Center is dedicated to promoting well-being in body, mind and spirit. We draw upon the gifts of the Earth, our intuitiveness and community to bring healing to all who are drawn to us.

lenders.name: David & Vera
lenders.loan_because: We like having the opportunity to help others achieve a significant difference in their everyday living circumstances.  With Kiva; many can achieve an income to support their families.  Kiva creates a person to person level of helping and caring.

lenders.name: Kelly

I also don\'t think it\'s acceptable that the people in the most dire situations are generally denied access to the very tools that could improve their lives.
